languages.text: Лишившись светила, система Райкад перестала существовать. Ее остывшие планеты унеслись в пустоту, более не удерживаемые гравитационной хваткой звезды. Спустя столетие фрагмент Райкада Минорис влетел в систему Фурибундус и был изловлен пустотными старателями. Кусок каменной породы был с почтением доставлен на Футфол и использован для реставрации статуи Бога-Императора — последняя почесть погубленному скверной миру.

Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.
languages.original_text: Лишившись светила, система Райкад перестала существовать. Ее остывшие планеты унеслись в пустоту, более не удерживаемые гравитационной хваткой звезды. Спустя столетие фрагмент Райкада Минорис влетел в систему Фурибундус и был изловлен пустотными старателями. Кусок каменной породы был с почтением доставлен на Футфол и использован для реставрации статуи Бога-Императора — последняя почесть погубленному скверной миру.

traits.locale_text: Left without a sun, the Rykad system ceased to exist. Its cold planets disappeared in the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of the star. After a hundred years, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus system and was caught by void miners. A piece of rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor monument as a last honour for the world devoured by corruption.

A piece of rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor monument as a last honour for the world devoured by corruption.

Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.

languages.text: 失去恒星之后，莱卡德星系不复存在。冰冷的行星失去了恒星引力的吸引，旋转着坠入了黑暗之中。一个世纪之后，小莱卡德的一块碎片飘入了怒焰星系，被矿工发现。人们怀着敬畏的心情，将这块岩石送到了落脚港，用来修复神皇的雕像，纪念那个被腐化所吞噬的世界。
languages.original_text: Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.

traits.locale_text: 失去恒星之后，莱卡德星系不复存在。冰冷的行星失去了恒星引力的吸引，旋转着坠入了黑暗之中。一个世纪之后，小莱卡德的一块碎片飘入了怒焰星系，被矿工发现。人们怀着敬畏的心情，将这块岩石送到了落脚港，用来修复神皇的雕像，纪念那个被腐化所吞噬的世界。

languages.text: Seiner Sonne beraubt hörte das Rykad-System auf zu existieren. Ohne die Anziehungskraft ihres Sterns sind die eisigen Planeten in die Dunkelheit abgedriftet. Ein Jahrhundert später trat ein Fragment von Rykad Minoris in das Furibundus-System ein und wurde dort von Leere-Bergarbeitern geborgen. Ein Stück des Felsens wurde ehrfürchtig nach Footfall gebracht und für die Restauration der Statue des Gottimperators genutzt, als Denkmal der Welt, die von der Verderbnis zerstört worden war.
languages.original_text: Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.

traits.locale_text: Seiner Sonne beraubt hörte das Rykad-System auf zu existieren. Ohne die Anziehungskraft ihres Sterns sind die eisigen Planeten in die Dunkelheit abgedriftet. Ein Jahrhundert später trat ein Fragment von Rykad Minoris in das Furibundus-System ein und wurde dort von Leere-Bergarbeitern geborgen. Ein Stück des Felsens wurde ehrfürchtig nach Footfall gebracht und für die Restauration der Statue des Gottimperators genutzt, als Denkmal der Welt, die von der Verderbnis zerstört worden war.

languages.text: Privé de son soleil, le système de Rykad disparut. Ses planètes, désormais glacées et libérées de leur attraction à une étoile, filèrent à travers la galaxie. Un siècle plus tard, un fragment de Rykad Minoris fut aperçu dans le système de Furibundus et attira l'attention de nombreux mineurs du vide. Un bloc de pierre fut envoyé à Castel et servit à restaurer la statue de l'Empereur-Dieu, en guise de dernier hommage au monde dévoré par la corruption.
languages.original_text: Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.

traits.locale_text: Privé de son soleil, le système de Rykad disparut. Ses planètes, désormais glacées et libérées de leur attraction à une étoile, filèrent à travers la galaxie. Un siècle plus tard, un fragment de Rykad Minoris fut aperçu dans le système de Furibundus et attira l'attention de nombreux mineurs du vide. Un bloc de pierre fut envoyé à Castel et servit à restaurer la statue de l'Empereur-Dieu, en guise de dernier hommage au monde dévoré par la corruption.

languages.text: Sin su sol, el sistema Rykad dejó de existir. Sus planetas congelados se dispersaron en la oscuridad, ahora que la gravedad de la estrella no los mantenía en órbita. Un siglo más tarde, un fragmento de Rykad Minoris entró en el sistema Furibundus y sus mineros del vacío lo recogieron. Se entregó una parte de la roca a Paso con ceremonia y se utilizó en la restauración de la estatua del Dios Emperador como último tributo al mundo devorado por la corrupción.
languages.original_text: Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.

traits.locale_text: Sin su sol, el sistema Rykad dejó de existir. Sus planetas congelados se dispersaron en la oscuridad, ahora que la gravedad de la estrella no los mantenía en órbita. Un siglo más tarde, un fragmento de Rykad Minoris entró en el sistema Furibundus y sus mineros del vacío lo recogieron. Se entregó una parte de la roca a Paso con ceremonia y se utilizó en la restauración de la estatua del Dios Emperador como último tributo al mundo devorado por la corrupción.

languages.text: 太陽を失ったライカド星系は消滅した。その極寒の惑星は、もはや恒星の重力に引き寄せられることなく、暗闇の中で空回りしている。その1世紀後、ライカド・ミノリスの破片がフュリバンダス星系に到達し、ヴォイドマインの鉱夫が捕らえた。その岩石の破片はフットフォールに敬意とともに届けられ、腐敗に蝕まれた惑星の最後の形見として神帝陛下像の修復に使われた。
languages.original_text: Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.

traits.locale_text: 太陽を失ったライカド星系は消滅した。その極寒の惑星は、もはや恒星の重力に引き寄せられることなく、暗闇の中で空回りしている。その1世紀後、ライカド・ミノリスの破片がフュリバンダス星系に到達し、ヴォイドマインの鉱夫が捕らえた。その岩石の破片はフットフォールに敬意とともに届けられ、腐敗に蝕まれた惑星の最後の形見として神帝陛下像の修復に使われた。

languages.text: Güneşsiz kalan Rykad Sistemi yok oldu. Artık yıldızlarının çekim kuvvetiyle bir arada tutulmayan donmuş gezegenler, karanlıkta sürüklenmeye başladı. Yüz yıl sonra Rykad Minoris'in bir parçası, Furibundus Sistemi'ne girip uçsuz madencilerinin eline geçti. Kayanın bir parçası hürmetle Binliman'a sunulup Tanrı İmparator heykelinin onarımında kullanıldı, yozlaşmaya kaybedilen dünya için son bir anıt dikilmiş oldu.
languages.original_text: Left without a sun, the Rykad System ceased to exist. Its now frigid planets spun away into the darkness, no longer held by the gravitational pull of their star. A century later, a fragment of Rykad Minoris entered the Furibundus System and was snared by void miners. A piece of its rock was delivered to Footfall with reverence and used in the restoration of the God-Emperor's statue as a final memorial to the world devoured by corruption.

traits.locale_text: Güneşsiz kalan Rykad Sistemi yok oldu. Artık yıldızlarının çekim kuvvetiyle bir arada tutulmayan donmuş gezegenler, karanlıkta sürüklenmeye başladı. Yüz yıl sonra Rykad Minoris'in bir parçası Furibundus Sistemi'ne girdi ve uçsuz madencileri tarafından ablukaya alındı. Kayanın bir parçası hürmetle Binliman'a sunuldu ve Tanrı İmparator'un heykelinin onarımında kullanıldı, böylece yozlaşmaya kaybedilen dünya için son bir anıt dikilmiş oldu.
